versions.changelog: Added The main screen will now show you the next shows that are going to record.  This saves a click into Shows.

Big Update.  Lots of stability changes, and some updated verbiage and icons.  More information at https://github.com/identd113/hdhr_VCR-AS/commit/1e65c927dc7b46a34db980c6ba2d05f7e9317e8a#diff-5af381b49e80c9f4c6828989c3cc939db4ccd1e8d39ed0142b4f10b9ab1d674b

Big update.  Added a logger, so we can more closely see what is happening, and makes it easier to track down bugs.  There is more to do, but satisfied this is working well for now.  Numerous bug fixes, including update_show from running on days the recording is not set to record.
Cleaned up some handlers, and testing version message in logs.
Added: hdhr_VCR.log in Documents folder to allow us to keep a running tab if what is happening.
Fixed show guide.  This is now our default method of adding shows.
Added Show Guide, to make it easier to select a show.
Rolled back previous release, and some small fixes.
Sorted show list to group shows in same status. Fixed issue when calculating show_time.
Pre Release of the announced release.
Made some changes to icons, and other UI elements`.
We will alert you if there are new versions!
